Getting started as a vendor

Follow these simple steps to get your ice cream business on the Chimes app and start reaching more customers.

1. Register Your Business

Complete the business registration form below with your business details and contact information.

Start here

2. Download App

Download the Chimes app from your device's app store.

3. Sign Up

Open the app, go to Settings → Vendor Sign In. Enter your business email address and click 'Sign Up'.

24hr approval

4. Go Live!

Chimes will enable your account within 24 hours and your vehicle will be shown on the map. Start serving customers and growing your business!

Start earning

Start Your Journey with Chimes!

Fill out this form to get your ice cream business on the Chimes app.

Social Media (Optional)
Van Information

We'll review your application and get back to you within 24 hours

Note: Chimes tracks your vehicle via your iPhone. If you would like to use an Android phone for tracking, or a dedicated GPS transmitter, please get in touch.

Any questions? We're here to help with your setup.
